name: VectorRacing
description:
VectorRacing is a racing game of the vector scanning style.
Please enjoy a high-speed race by good old-fashioned graphic.


* Game Features
- SingleRace mode
The race by 6 including COM is played.
- TimeTrial mode
It attacks it with one player at time. The data of the best time can be displayed as a ghost car.
- 6 kinds of player cars
- 7 kinds of courses
- It corresponds to an online ranking and achievements in OpenFeint/GameCenter.
- The replay data of an online ranking is reproduced, and it is possible to fight as a ghost car
(Up-loading and the reproduction of the replay data are functions only of OpenFeint).
